entry.title: WIND WARNING , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 3:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.8°C
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
